entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High zero.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
